data.eml:eml: A new species of clausophyid calycophoran siphonophore (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa), Kephyes hiulcus sp. nov., widely distributed throughout the world's oceans

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grossmann, Mary Matilda, Lindsay, Dhugal John (2017): A new species of clausophyid calycophoran siphonophore (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa), Kephyes hiulcus sp. nov., widely distributed throughout the world's oceans. Zootaxa 4250 (1): 43-54, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4250.1.3
